definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Conics is a difficult section in the Analytic Geometry for senior high school students.
sentences.chinese: 圓錐曲線是高中生解析幾何學習中的一個難點。

sentences.english: Based on the analysis, determine the unicity of point of tangency and point of intersection.
sentences.chinese: 基於在解析幾何的基礎上確定了切線和交點的唯一性。

sentences.english: The teaching of plane analytical geometry is short of the suitable courseware resources in practice.
sentences.chinese: 適合學校實際平面解析幾何課堂教學的課件資源匱乏。
